GetContainerizationJobDetails.name: GetContainerizationJobDetails
GetContainerizationJobDetails.description: Grants permission to get the details of all Containerization jobs

GetDeploymentJobDetails.name: GetDeploymentJobDetails
GetDeploymentJobDetails.description: Grants permission to get the details of all Deployment jobs

StartContainerizationJob.name: StartContainerizationJob
StartContainerizationJob.description: Grants permission to start a Containerization job

StartDeploymentJob.name: StartDeploymentJob
StartDeploymentJob.description: Grants permission to start a Deploymnet job
